contents: Article 2 (Application) This regulation applies to the following items. Revised 2022. 1. 24. 1. Korea Sports Council (hereinafter referred to as *Sports Council) 2. Member sports organizations, member city/provincial sports associations and their member organizations (hereinafter referred to as *Sports Council-related organizations) 3. Sports Council and Sports Council relations Executives and employees of the organization (employees only apply to provisions related to awards) 4. Persons who temporarily hold the position of executives of the competition during the competition 5. Members such as coaches, players, referees, athlete management personnel, etc. registered with sports association-related organizations and sports Organizations such as the Ministry of Gyeonggi Province Revised July 9, 2021, January 24, 2022
